content.paragraph-1: I am a web and mobile frontend developer passionate about the development of truly useful and enjoyable technological solutions for end users.
content.paragraph-2: At a professional level I have great interest and knowledge focused on the development of web and mobile applications, focused on always offering a pleasant and attractive experience to end users who interact with the product.
content.paragraph-3: Thus, the technical and structural knowledge provided by Systems and Computing Engineering, together with the aesthetic and experimental knowledge provided by Design, allow for truly innovate ideas to materialize.

a.name: Personal page
description: This project is focused on creating my personal webpage presented in a different way compared to the most common and conventional web pages.
The application is presented visually as an operating system and has a cyberpunk color-style, created with features such as:
- The page will be presented as an OS similar to Apple laptops.
- The index section will be presented as the desktop of the OS.
- Each section will be presented as a window which emulates an open program in the OS.
- The application has the option to switch between 7 different themes.
- The application has the option to switch the language between English and Spanish.
- Finally, the docker will have easy-to-access links to useful personal pages such as Whatsapp, Behance, Github and linkedIn accounts.

b.name: Data Visualizer
description: This project is focused on applying concepts related to data structures and algorithms in a practical way.
The application currently has two sections:

- The first section was created to visualize different sorting algorithms, such as Bubble Sorting, Selection Sorting, Insertion Sorting and Quick Sort, applied into different number arrays that can be generated by the user.
- The second section was created to visualize different ways of traversing tree, such as Breadth First Search (BFS) and Depth Search First (DFS) -including Post Order, In Order and Pre Order.

c.name: League of Legends
description: This project is focused on applying concepts related to services and observables using and external API
The application currently has one section:
- The first section was created to visualize all the available champion in the game League of Legends game.
- Once the user clicks on a champion, the application shows detailed information such as passive and abilities, statistics and lore.

d.name: Sudoku Solver
description: This project is focused on applying concepts related to data structures and algorithms in a practical way.
The application currently has one section:
- The first section was created to visualize all the steps needed to solve a sudoku game using the backtracking strategy.
- The application allows the user to generate random puzzles in order to see different steps to approach every puzzle.

e.name: Devbox Preview
description: This project is focused on rebuild the whole webpage of the company focused on preview the created landing pages for portfolio presentation purposes.
The application wants to allow user search and preview the created pages by its name or company name:
- Each item tries to show a predefined image to give to the user a quick idea of how the landing page should see.

The page was uploaded into the Eloqua platform following the DFIN client requirements and needings.

description: This project is focused on rebuild the whole page of the company focused on showing the services provided to the clients.
The application wants to allow user see what are the core services provided.
- The page has easy link to provide easy ways to contact to the company.

z.name: Sentences Game
description: This project is focused on applying concepts related to drag & drop events into a educational game to practice English grammar topics.
The application wants to allow user to create sentences using drag & drop interaction on the board:
- The sentences must have a simple structure composed by a pronoun, auxiliary verb, infinitive verb and object.
